body: What if you use an ASCII character in your test?

This error seems to occur only with CJK charactor.

No error in PowerShell-7.2.0-preview.8
It seems that this bug has been solved in `7.2.0-preview.5`.
[#13551](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13551)
@kumamiko Thanks for your investigations! I close this as duplication of #13551. We can reopen if needed.
